thread.title: Renaissance Center workers sent home as strong winds pose problems for skycraper
thread.title_full: Renaissance Center workers sent home as strong winds pose problems for skycraper

author: Dana Afana | dafana@mlive.com
title: Renaissance Center workers sent home as strong winds pose problems for skycraper
text: General Motors sent employees home from the Renaissance Center on Wednesday because extraordinarily strong winds were posing potential building problems at the automaker's downtown headquarters.
